text: In nomine domini nostri Ihesu Christi.Her swutelað on þisum gewrite hu Wulfric abbod & Ealdred Lifinges sunu þæs ðegnes wæron sammæle ymbe þæt land æt Clife.

Þæt he gebeh for Godes ege & for sanctus Augustinus & for hys freonda mynegunge mid lande into sancte Augustine & ælce geare sylð on sanctus Augustinus mæssedæg,I<pund> to geswutelunga & æfter hys dæge gange þæt land into sancte Augustine swa gewerud swa hyt þonne byð.
Þises ys to gewitnesse se hired æt sancte Augustine & se æt Cristes cyrcean & Lifing his fæder & Siweard & Sired his broðor & Wulfstan æt Sealtwuda & oðer Wulfstan.
& þis sy gedon for Siferð & for his ofsprincg to hyra sawle ðearfe a butan ende, amen.
